participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Curious and expressive, Amina enjoys engaging in conversations and is eager to learn about others.
participant_1.background: now i live in the united states. my aunt helped me escape when i was 16. i was born in somalia. i was forced to marry when i was 14. i like to dance.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and determined, Ethan is driven by his goals and loves discussing his aspirations.
participant_2.background: i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for generations. i am from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm.

content.text: You know how to type a messages, right?
